name: Smash Birds 4 best of all cool
name_original: Smash Birds 4 best of all cool
description:
PLAY FOR FREE in the most addicting and awesome game. This time you need to smash all the geometry things you can!

Highly entertaining for kids, boys, girls and all family. Lots of fun, action, good music and sound.
Try to get the highest score and climb the Game Center leaderboard!
